verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David, when Nathan the prophet came to him,) (after he had gone in to Bathsheba.) Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> according to Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness;<s%> According to the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of Thy <S%H7356>compassion<s%> <S%H4229>blot<s%> out my <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%>
<S%H3526>Wash<s%> me <S%H7235>thoroughly<s%> from my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> me from my <S%H9128>sin.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> And my <S%H9128>sin<s%> is <S%H8548>ever<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.

Against Thee, Thee <S%H905>only,<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> And <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>what<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H4616>So<s%> that Thou art <S%H6663>justified<s%> when Thou dost <S%H1696>speak,<s%> And <S%H2135>blameless<s%> when Thou dost <S%H8199>judge.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I was <S%H9123>brought<s%> <S%H9123>forth<s%> in <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And in <S%H2399>sin<s%> my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3179>conceived<s%> me.

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> Thou dost <S%H2654>desire<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> in the <S%H2910>innermost<s%> <S%H2910>being,<s%> And in the <S%H5640>hidden<s%> <S%H5640>part<s%> Thou wilt make me <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H2398>Purify<s%> me with <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and I shall be <S%H2891>clean;<s%> <S%H3526>Wash<s%> me, and I shall be <S%H3835>whiter<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H7950>snow.<s%>
Make me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> Let the <S%H6106>bones<s%> which Thou hast <S%H1794>broken<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice.<s%>
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from my <S%H2399>sins,<s%> And <S%H4229>blot<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
<S%H1254>Create<s%> in me a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> And <S%H2318>renew<s%> a <S%H3559>steadfast<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me.
Do not <S%H7993>cast<s%> me <S%H7993>away<s%> from Thy <S%H6440>presence,<s%> And do not <S%H3947>take<s%> Thy <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> from me.
<S%H2318>Restore<s%> to me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of Thy <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> And <S%H5564>sustain<s%> me with a <S%H5082>willing<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
[Then] I will <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> Thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And <S%H2400>sinners<s%> will be <S%H7725>converted<s%> to Thee.

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8668>salvation;<s%> [Then] my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will <S%H7442>joyfully<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%> of Thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H8193>lips,<s%> That my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> may <S%H5046>declare<s%> Thy <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
For Thou dost not <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> otherwise I would <S%H5414>give<s%> it; Thou art not <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

The <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> A <S%H7665>broken<s%> and a <S%H1794>contrite<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou wilt not <S%H959>despise.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> Thou wilt <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> In <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H3632>burnt<s%> <S%H3632>offering;<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> will be <S%H5927>offered<s%> on Thine <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
